sentences.en: Horse breeding is indeed a risky enterprise.
sentences.cn: 养马的确是一项有风险的事业。

sentences.en: State bureaucracies can tend to stifle enterprise and initiative.
sentences.cn: 国家官僚体制会压抑人的进取心和积极性。

sentences.en: Its geographical location stimulated overseas mercantile enterprise.
sentences.cn: 它的地理位置激发了海外商业企业的兴趣。
